name: When Is Your Turn
description:
This is a online multiplayer Buzzer game.

Rules:

  • Upon starting, click on Host (if you're hosting), or enter the host's IP address that you want to join.
  • Everyone is assigned a series of numbers at the beginning the round.
  • Click the screen to sound the buzzer when it is your turn.
  • Example: If your next number is "3", you have to buzz after you hear 2 buzzers.
  • You gain score the faster you buzz when it is your turn.
  • You lose score if you buzz at the wrong turn.
  • When all numbers have been buzzed correctly, the round ends, and the game is restarted.
